QuestData.Title: Seeking Shelter
QuestData.Description:
I must head back to de arena. Razgaji will want to know what happened here.
If you seek shelter, you will find it at de outpost not too far from here.
I will let our leader know you're coming.
Be safe, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find Razgaji at the Scorched Sands Outpost.
